text: Asante Samuel Jr. (born October 3, 1999) is an American football cornerback for the Los Angeles Chargers of the National Football League (NFL). He played college football at Florida State and was drafted by the Chargers in the second round of the 2021 NFL Draft. He is the son of former NFL cornerback Asante Samuel. ==References== Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:American football cornerbacks Category:Los Angeles Chargers players
title: Asante Samuel Jr.
